title: Start over by republishing the app and ensuring the correct production URL is used

requirements.text: Republish the current CallCraftAI frontend so that the intended production URL is the free Caffeine domain (callcraftai.caffeine.xyz), instead of continuing to show the draft/temporary URL https://create-marketing-website-for-ai-receptionist-servi-ijk.caffeine.xyz/.

quotes:
I still see the same url 
https://create-marketing-website-for-ai-receptionist-servi-ijk.caffeine.xyz/

Can we start over

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting callcraftai.caffeine.xyz loads the CallCraftAI marketing site (the React SPA), not a Caffeine placeholder page.
A user can share callcraftai.caffeine.xyz and recipients consistently see the same live site.
The app is no longer dependent on (or only accessible from) the draft/temporary URL https://create-marketing-website-for-ai-receptionist-servi-ijk.caffeine.xyz/.

requirements.text: Add a lightweight in-app verification indicator (e.g., a small, unobtrusive line in the footer) that displays the current hostname (window.location.hostname) so the user can confirm which domain is serving the live build.

quotes:
I still see the same url 
https://create-marketing-website-for-ai-receptionist-servi-ijk.caffeine.xyz/

Can we start over

acceptanceCriteria: The footer shows a label like "Domain: <current-hostname>" using English text.
The label updates correctly when the site is loaded from different hostnames (draft URL vs free domain).
The indicator does not break layout on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only and must be composed).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Building new product features beyond republishing/URL correction and the minimal domain indicator.
Adding third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Adding a database or external hosting/CDN configuration.
